title: Peacock Chair - PP550 - Ash Ash
body: The Peacock Chair originally designed in 1947 by Hans J Wegner was inspired by the classic Windsor chair of the time and their well-known bars for backrests. Wegner added his stamp to the design by the fine 'blades' on the bar, and the position of the blades to add comfort to the occupant, enveloping the the seated with comfort.
